description: The instance_update_at_top() method strips cell_name by mistake.
title: instance's cell_name not set in API cell

commit 6cd0cdfbc03adf0cc633dd964f7cfbaaa5dee567
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jan 10 08:58:21 2013 +0000

    Update instance's cell_name in API cell.
    
    It was accidentally being removed before updating the DB due to code
    being moved and not updated.  The test for the method was broken, too,
    allowing this bug to sneak in.
    
    Fixes bug 1098093
    
    Change-Id: I05c00b8b100568b39afb8ee0ca7ee94d4dd97c0a
    (cherry picked from commit abc9a0d5df70ee00ba38e655a4d88ae18417f0e3)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
